name: Proximus
goal:
Proximus is the leading national provider of telephony, internet, television and network-based ICT services in Belgium. It also operates in the international market via its affiliate BICS.
Its high-quality interconnected fixed and mobile networks offer access anywhere and anytime to digital services and data, as well as to a broad offering of multimedia content.

Proximus is investing in futureproof networks and innovative solutions, creating the foundations
for sustainable growth. Its aim is to deliver the best customer experience and to simplify the customer journey by offering accessible and easy to use solutions.

Proximus promotes a connected world accessible to all and actively contributes to the economic, social and environmental development of the society in which it operates.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
